fesbuk haraha handunagath tharunayan ha tharuniyan pirisak awissawella- puwakpitiya sirisanda pradeshaye rahasigathawa pawathwu sadayakadi mathpethi samaga eewa alewi kala bawa kiyana ehi sanwidhayakaya athadanguwata gatha bawa surabadu departhamenthuwa pawasanawa.me sambandhayen wimasimedi surabadu adhikari channa wirakkodi kiya sitiye kolambaa wishesha surabadu eekakaye sthanadhipathi pi en hemanthage pradhanathwayen mema watalima kala bawayi.mewani mathpethi sadayak gamaka pawathwime di watalu palamu awasthawa meya bawa sandahan.rahasigathawa mema sthanaya watalana awasthawe di math drawya panaya nisa ehi siti siyallan adhikawa matha wi siti bawada wartha wanawa.29 aarambha wu mema sadaya 30 wana da dakwa ma pawathi bawada sandahan.mehi thibi adhika watinakamakin yuth wides mathpan bothala wishala pramanayak da sura badu niladharin soyagena thibenawa.kese wethath mema sthanaye mathpethi sadaya pawathwuwath thawath sadayak wenath thanaka pawathwa athi bawatada thorathuru wartha wanawa.ema sadaya da puwakpitiya sirisanda game pawathwimata thibu namuth kisiyam hethuwak nisa eya wenath thanakata genagos thibenawa.emanisa methanata pamini fesbuk mithuran mathwima thoragena thibenawa.mita pera da samaja jala web adawi osse danuwath kara hotalayakadi sadayak pawathwala ehidi mathdrawya bhawitha kara asabhya lesa hasirunu pirisakata me masa 16 wana da udammita gamwasiyan wirodhaya palakirime siddhiyak wartha wuna.apa warthakaru pawasuwe, thaththwaya palanaya kirima sandaha polisiyatada madihathwimata da siduwu bawayi.samaja jala web adawi osse tharuna tharuniyan danuwath karamin mema sadaya 16 wana da dawasa pura pawathwa thibune ja ala - udammita hotalayakadiyi.ehi palamu adiyara pasugiyada  uswatakeyiyawa pradeshaye hotalayakadi pawathwa thibune ek ayekugen rupiyal 3000ka mudalak aya karamin.ema sadaye dewani adiyara udammita pradeshaye hotalayakadi pawathi athara eeta dahasakata aasanna pirisak sahabhagi wi thibenawa.sadayedi mathpan saha mathdrawya wishala lesa bhawitha kala adala pirisa hotalayen pitathata pamina asabhya lesa hasirima hethuwen gamwasiyan eeta dadi wirodhaya palakala.
